item.title: Christmas Eve
item.description: The night before Christmas! Spend time with the ones you love and prepare for the excitement of gift-giving in the morning!

item.title: Christmas Day
item.description: Christmas Day! No school, no work, just snow, stockings, and presents! We hope you have the happiest of holidays.

item.title: New Years' Eve
item.description: The last night of the year! Break out the music, the confetti, and the silly hats. Make sure to spend all the time with the people closest to you; you won't see them 'till next year!

item.title: New Years' Day
item.description: "Happy New Year! Make those resolutions last as long as you can ðŸ˜‰
